explains: v. 趾高气扬地走，昂首阔步；<非正式>展示自己的本领（或外表），炫耀（strut your stuff）；支撑，撑开
n. 支柱，撑杆；趾高气扬的步态，昂首阔步的样子

sentences.en: One strut had fractured and been crudely repaired in several places.
sentences.cn: 一根支柱断裂了，好几处已做了粗略修补。

sentences.en: Peacocks strut in the surrounding meadow.
sentences.cn: 孔雀在周围的草地上昂首阔步。

sentences.en: When you strut your stuff, you're not being a show-off.
sentences.cn: 当你高视阔步的时候，你并不是在炫耀。
